name: Secret Savings
description:
StoryEven though you are the master of the house, unfortunately your wife grasps all rights about yourself.
One evening you decided to get back all secret savings hidden by your wife.
Something, however, is strange... It is no only secret saving that your wife is hiding...Find out the secret savings of wife!!The purpose of this game is to collect secret savings.
You can find them everywhere in the house.
（Wait, "secret" doesn't make any sense...）。All of the house is the hiding placeIn the house there are a lot of place where the wife can hide her money. It is recommended to search everywhere in bedroom, garage and so on.


You can move the items which you can find in this game.
Some secret savings may be hidden behind books, can, tools or miscellaneous goods to which you do not pay attention in daily life.
Let's get your money back with searching carefully on book shelves and drawers!!
What?...wife will discover your deed? No problem, it is because all of the secret savings are earned by YOU!!You can play this game with only one controller.This game does not need two VR controllers in playing.
When one of your VR controllers is out of battery, when you cannot find out one of your VR controllers, and so on.
Even if you face these cases, there is no problem. Let's go to make a counterattack against your wife!!
